ChOIR: Empowering Low-Power Wide Area Networks in Urban Settings

An approach implemented on the LoRa platform to enable dense, rapid scaling.

Learn More

Uses Power More Effectively

Transmits and receives messages that otherwise would have been lost.

Supports Simultaneous Users

Distinguishes transmissions from multiple users using the idea of a frequency "footprint."

Collaboratively Increases Range

Uses multiple correlated transmissions to communicate with a base station that would otherwise be out of range.
